SingleNounWithListProdclass

Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

A user could attempt to use a noun list where a single noun is required. This is not a grammatical error, so we accept it grammatically; however, for disambiguation purposes we score it lower than a singleNoun production with only one noun phrase, and if we try to resolve it, we'll fail with an error. `class `**`SingleNounWithListProd`**` :   `[`NounPhraseProd`](../object/NounPhraseProd.html)
